Detailed Description

A link a user can use to take action on an activity update on the provider.

Create an action link object, fill in the object's fields, and add the object the JRActivityObject::mActionLinks array of your JRActivityObject.

Each action link must contain a link: href, and some text describing what action will happen if someone clicks the link: text.

Example:
action_links:
[
{
"text": "Rate this quiz result",
"href": "http://example.com/quiz/12345/result/6789/rate"
},
{
"text": "Take this quiz",
"href": "http://example.com/quiz/12345/take"
}
]

Constructor

JRActionLink ( String  text,
String  href 
)

Creates a JRActionLink initialized with the given text and href.

Parameters
textThe text describing the link. This value cannot be null
hrefA link a user can use to take action on an activity update on the provider. This value cannot be null
Exceptions
IllegalArgumentExceptionif text or href is null
